title: x/mobile: all apk created by GoMobile give a black screen just on phone
body:
Hello,

I have tried to create several example of APK with GOMOBILE, but when i test them, she works in the emulator BlueStacks, and also on my SAMSUNG TAB, but not on my Android Samsung note 1 and not also on my Android Samsung note 2.
All the application give to me only the title, and the screen is black ;-(
After several seconds, the application stop

If someone know, how can i fix my problem

My system is W7 and when i write "Gomobile Version" the answer is "Gomobile version unknow"
SAMSUNG NOTE1 and NOTE2, have ANDROID v4.1.2
SAMSUNG TAB 3, have ANDROID v4.4.2

Have a good day
